title: Availability and Region Failure: Joint Consensus in CockroachDB
description: At Cockroach Labs, we write quite a bitabout consensus algorithms. They are a critical component of CockroachDB and we rely on them in the lower layers of our transactional, scalable, distributed key-value store. In fact, large clusters can contain tens of thousands of consensus groups because in CockroachDB, every Range (similar to a shard) is an independent consensus group. Under the hood, we run a large number of instances of Raft(a consensus algorithm), which has come with interesting engineering challenges.
